workouts.name: IRONMAN RACE DAY
workouts.humanReadable:
3.8km Swim: 1:03-1:08
180km Bike: 5:00-5:15
42.2km Run: 4:15-4:35

TOTAL: 11:30-12:00

Execute your plan. Trust your training.

swim.notes: Start wide, settle into rhythm at 100m. Draft when possible. Sight every 8-10 strokes. Negative split if possible.

bike.notes: Hold steady power. Do NOT surge on hills. Stay aero. Eat/drink every 15-20 min. Save matches for the run.

run.notes: Walk aid stations first 20km. Negative split the marathon. Start conservative 5:05-5:10/km. Build after halfway if feeling good.

transitions.notes: Keep it simple. Don't rush. Apply sunscreen in T1.

preRace.nightBefore: Pasta, rice - familiar foods. Hydrate well. Early to bed.
preRace.morning: 3-3.5 hrs before: 600-800 cal (oatmeal, banana, toast). 1 hr before: 200 cal + 500ml water. 15 min before: gel

during.swim: Nothing - just focus on the swim

products: Solid food first 3 hrs if desired

nutrition.notes: Nothing new on race day. Practice this exact plan in training. Adjust for heat - more fluid, more sodium.

mentalStrategy.swim: Stay calm. Find your rhythm. This is just the warmup.
mentalStrategy.bike: Be patient. It's a long day. Focus on power, not position.
mentalStrategy.run: This is where the race begins. Execute the plan. Break it into 7km segments.
mentalStrategy.darkMoments: They will come. Accept them. Keep moving forward. It always passes.
